name: DEFINITELY NOT ACCURATE ZEPPELIN SIMULATOR
description:
DEFINITELY NOT ACCURATE ZEPPELIN SIMULATOR is a Co-Op Local game where you and your partner command a Zeppelin into the afternoon sky. Complete the circuit as fast as you can and learn to cooperate with your homie.

CONTROLS:

LEFT MOTOR [A]

LEFT ROT [Q]

RIGHT MOTOR [L]

RIGHT ROT [P]

ROT UP [B]

ROT DOWN [Y]

FILL AIR [SPACE]
